name: Color the Sheep - Find the Odd Sheep!
name_original: Color the Sheep - Find the Odd Sheep!
description:
Are you ready for some sheep madness?
Make all the 16 sheep the same color by clicking on all the ones with an odd color. Easy to learn, hard to master.
Many levels to play. Share with your friends and compete with each other on Game Center.
Highly addicting! Have fun!
